group05pkg 0.0.0.9000

    • Introduction to group05pkg

    Predicts the outcome of a target variable

    predict_drugs_workflow.Rd

    Given a fitted KNN workflow object and new test data, this function predicts the outcome of a target variable for the test data using the KNN model. The predicted outcome is then written to the data folder.

    predict_drugs_workflow(knn_wf, test_data)

    Arguments

    knn_wf

    A fitted knn workflow object

    test_data

    A dataframe containing test data to predict the outcome of cannabis usage

    Value

    Writes the predicted outcome of cannabis usage for the new data in the data folder

    Examples

    library(magrittr)
n <- 1000
mock_pred_data <- data.frame(
  predicted_outcome = sample(c("no", "yes"), n, replace = TRUE),
  X1 = rnorm(n),
  X2 = rnorm(n),
  X3 = rnorm(n)
)

test_data <- data.frame(
  X1 = c(0.5, 0.1, 0.7),
  X2 = c(0.9, 0.3, 0.6),
  X3 = c(0.2, 0.4, 0.8)
)

mock_spec <- parsnip::nearest_neighbor(
  weight_func = "rectangular",
  neighbors = parsnip::tune()
) %>%
  parsnip::set_engine("kknn") %>%
  parsnip::set_mode("classification")

mock_recipe <- recipes::recipe(as.formula(paste0("predicted_outcome", " ~ .")),
                               data = mock_pred_data
                               ) %>%
recipes::step_scale(recipes::all_predictors()) %>%
recipes::step_center(recipes::all_predictors())

mock_knn_wf <- workflows::workflow() %>%
  workflows::add_recipe(mock_recipe) %>%
  workflows::add_model(mock_spec) %>%
  parsnip::fit(data = mock_pred_data)
#> Warning: tune samples were requested but there were 1000 rows in the data. 995 will be used.

predict_drugs_workflow(mock_knn_wf, test_data)
#> # A tibble: 3 × 4
#>   .pred_class    X1    X2    X3
#>   <fct>       <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 no            0.5   0.9   0.2
#> 2 no            0.1   0.3   0.4
#> 3 no            0.7   0.6   0.8
